snippet: News of police raids in France aimed at young extremist Muslims added to the anxieties of French Jews and Muslims worried about the expansion of radical Islam.
abstract: French Jewish and Muslim leaders warn of rising anti-Semitism among young Muslims, two days after police arrested 11 men and fatally shot one in raids in a handful of cities aimed at young radical Muslims.
lead_paragraph: News of police raids in France aimed at young extremist Muslims added to the anxieties of French Jews and Muslims worried about the expansion of radical Islam.

headline.seo: In France, Jews and Muslims Warn of Anti-Semitism
